AspectLibrary.Name: Metalama.Patterns.Caching
AspectLibrary.Author: PostSharp Technologies
AspectLibrary.Summary: A robust caching framework for C# supporting both in-memory caching, Redis distributed caching, and multi-node cache synchronization over Azure Message Bus or Redis Pub/Sub. Supports type-safe cache invalidation and object-oriented cache dependencies.

Aspect.Name: Cache
Aspect.Description: Caches the return value of the target method as a function of its arguments.

Aspect.Name: InvalidateCache
Aspect.Description: Causes an invocation of the target method to remove from the cache the result of invocations of other given methods with the same arguments.

Aspect.Name: CacheKey
Aspect.Description: Causes the target field or property to be a part of the object identity when the object is used as an argument or as a dependency of a cached method. Implements the IFormattable interface.
